mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ios_profile WHERE certificate_id = #{certificateId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM ios_profile WHERE bundle_id = #{bundleId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM ios_profile WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM ios_profile WHERE team_id = #{teamId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM ios_profile WHERE profile_type = #{profileType} ORDER BY create_time DESC
